subject: feat(ui): add mobile-friendly header with overflow menu
body:
Secondary actions (import, export, schema badge, mode toggle) collapse
into a hamburger dropdown menu on screens <768px. The primary action
("+ New Item") stays always visible in the header row. Click outside
the menu closes it.

Additional mobile improvements:
- Touch-friendly 40-44px minimum hit targets (WCAG compliant)
- CSS hamburger icon (no icon library dependency)
- Dropdown slides in with subtle animation
- Input font bumped to 16px on mobile to prevent iOS auto-zoom
- View switcher tabs expand to equal-width on mobile

Desktop layout is unchanged â€” the secondary container uses
display:contents so its children flow inline as before.
